identity.name: KommunalCRM
identity.aesthetic: Swiss-Style Administrative, High-Density Data, Clean Lines
identity.theme_strategy: Light Mode Default (for clarity) with Dark Sidebar (for anchor). Dark Mode available.

layout.spacing_system: Generous padding (p-6, p-8) for containers, tight gaps (gap-4) for data grids.
layout.grid_strategy: Bento Grid Mode B (High Density) for Dashboard. 12-column grid base.

buttons.primary: bg-slate-900 text-white hover:bg-slate-800 shadow-sm rounded-md px-4 py-2 font-medium transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-slate-700 border border-slate-200 hover:bg-slate-50 shadow-sm rounded-md px-4 py-2 font-medium
buttons.ghost: text-slate-600 hover:bg-slate-100 hover:text-slate-900 rounded-md px-3 py-2

cards.default: bg-white rounded-lg border border-slate-200 shadow-sm p-6 hover:shadow-md transition-shadow duration-200

inputs.default: flex h-10 w-full rounded-md border border-slate-300 bg-white px-3 py-2 text-sm placeholder:text-slate-400 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-slate-400 focus:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

badges.default: inline-flex items-center rounded-full border border-slate-200 px-2.5 py-0.5 text-xs font-semibold transition-colors focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-slate-400 focus:ring-offset-2 text-slate-900

visual_enhancers.shadows: shadow-sm for cards, shadow-lg for dropdowns/modals. Avoid heavy drop shadows.
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use strictly for sticky headers and toast notifications. bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-md.
visual_enhancers.gradients: NO GRADIENTS for backgrounds. Use solid colors. Subtle gradients allowed on 'Premium' buttons only.
visual_enhancers.data_visualization: Use Recharts. Colors: Slate-900 (Primary), Sky-500 (Secondary), Emerald-500 (Tertiary).

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import to index.css immediately.
2. UPDATE TAILWIND: Configure the font families (Public Sans for headings, Inter for body) and colors in tailwind.config.js.
3. SIDEBAR: Implement a fixed left sidebar with the dark theme (Slate 900). It must be responsive (collapsible on mobile).
4. DASHBOARD: Rebuild the dashboard using the Bento Grid layout. Use 'Cards' for widgets (Calendar, Recent Motions, Stats).
5. TABLES: Use Shadcn Table component but add 'dense' styling (py-2) for high data density.
6. LANGUAGE: Ensure all hardcoded text is in GERMAN (e.g., 'Dashboard', 'Kontakte', 'Antr√§ge', 'Kalender').
7. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid to all sidebar links, buttons, and inputs.
8. DO NOT BREAK BACKEND: Keep all API calls and data structures exactly as they are. Only change the UI layer.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Avoid 'AI Slop': No purple gradients, no centered text layouts for apps.
Use 'Public Sans' for all Headings (h1-h3). Use 'Inter' for body text.
Primary Action Color is Slate-900 (Black/Dark Blue), NOT Blue-600. This is a serious tool.
Ensure contrast ratios are high (WCAG AA).
All dates must be formatted in German locale (DD.MM.YYYY).
